description: This is the main source file for a Flutter-based calculator app, defining the main widget, theming, calculator logic, and UI components such as display, keypad, and operation buttons.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Main application widget that sets up theming and home screen.

classes.name: _CalculatorState
classes.description: Holds calculator logic state including input, accumulator, operation, and evaluation status.

classes.name: CalculatorScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget managing calculator display and input interactions.

classes.name: _DisplayCard
classes.description: UI component for displaying current value and subtitle.

classes.name: _OperationsRow
classes.description: UI component for selecting between addition and subtraction operations.

classes.name: _OpChip
classes.description: UI chip representing an operation (+ or -), indicating selection.

classes.name: _Keypad
classes.description: UI component for calculator keypad layout and input buttons.

classes.name: _KeyButton
classes.description: UI component for individual keypad buttons, supporting icons and labels.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Flutter app, runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns the custom theme data for the app.

methods.name: _formatNumber
methods.description: Formats a double value into a user-readable string, avoiding unnecessary decimal points.

methods.name: _parseInputOrZero
methods.description: Parses the current input string into a double, defaulting to zero on failure.

methods.name: _clearAll
methods.description: Resets the calculator state to initial values.

methods.name: _backspace
methods.description: Removes the last character from input, or resets if just evaluated.

methods.name: _appendDigit
methods.description: Adds a digit to the current input, handling leading zeros and negative sign cases.

methods.name: _appendDecimalPoint
methods.description: Adds a decimal point to the input if not already present.

methods.name: _setOperation
methods.description: Sets the pending operation (+ or -), evaluating previous if necessary.

methods.name: _applyOp
methods.description: Performs the arithmetic operation (+ or -) on two doubles.

methods.name: _evaluate
methods.description: Computes the result of the pending operation.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI, including display, operation buttons, and keypad, with theming.

methods.name: _buildSubtitle
methods.description: Constructs the subtitle string indicating current operation or result status.
